short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access button to the extensions page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick access button to the extensions page
ie chrome://extensions/
Basically it combines two clicks ie extensions log followed by manage extensions to one click.
